alert.note: Alert for Coconino Plateau; Eastern Mogollon Rim; Grand Canyon Country; Kaibab Plateau; Western Mogollon Rim; White Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 07 at 2:43PM MST until November 07 at 7:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * WHERE...Mogollon Rim, Kaibab Plateau, Grand Canyon Country, Coconino Plateau, and White Mountains. * WHEN...Until 7 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could snap resulting in a few power outages. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Secure loose outdoor objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind. Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles, such as RVs, campers, and tractor trailers. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Coconino Plateau; Eastern Mogollon Rim; Grand Canyon Country; Kaibab Plateau; Western Mogollon Rim; White Mountains
